price: 4. Hinnay garabat osisaay, Qhuraan caatih cubbusak akriy!
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
